snippet.title: 14 people escape Ipswich Motorway pile-up
snippet.content:
ALL 14 people involved in a four-vehicle pile-up on the Ipswich Motorway in peak hour traffic escaped the wreckage without injury.
School time traffic was backed up at Wacol after the cars collided at 3.30pm yesterday.
Paramedics assessed 14 people on scene but did not take anybody to hospital.
14 people assessed on scene with nil transports to hospital after a 4-vehicle crash on Ipswich Mwy at 3.33pm. Expect traffic delays.
